languages.text: "В ночи, погрузившись в медитацию, я слышу их вой. Они охотятся в Кьялхалле, и сердце мое рвется к ним. Однажды мы встретимся".
"At night, when I sink into meditation, I hear them howling. They are hunting in Kjalhalla, and my heart yearns to join them. One day we will meet again."
languages.original_text: "В ночи, погрузившись в медитацию, я слышу их вой. Они охотятся в Кьялхалле, и сердце мое рвется к ним. Однажды мы встретимся".

traits.locale_text: "At night, when I sink into meditation, I hear them howling. They are hunting in Kjalhalla, and my heart yearns to join them. One day we will meet again."
"At night, when I sink into meditation, I hear them howling. They are hunting in Kjalhalla, and my heart yearns to join them. One day we will meet again."
"At night, when I sink into meditation, I hear them howling. They are hunting in Kjalhalla, and my heart yearns to join them. One day we will meet again."
"At night, when I sink into meditation, I hear them howling. They are hunting in Kjalhalla, and my heart yearns to join them. One day we will meet again."

languages.text: «Por la noche, cuando medito, los oigo aullar. Están cazando en Kjalhalla y mi corazón anhela unirse a ellos. Algún día nos reuniremos».
languages.original_text: "At night, when I sink into meditation, I hear them howling. They are hunting in Kjalhalla, and my heart yearns to join them. One day we will meet again."

traits.locale_text: «Por la noche, cuando medito, los oigo aullar. Están cazando en Kjalhalla y mi corazón anhela unirse a ellos. Algún día nos reuniremos».

languages.text: “当了晚上，当然深入冥想时，我总会听到他们的嚎叫。他们在卡尔哈拉狩猎，而我也渴望加入他们的行列。总有一天，我们会再见面的。”
languages.original_text: "At night, when I sink into meditation, I hear them howling. They are hunting in Kjalhalla, and my heart yearns to join them. One day we will meet again."

traits.locale_text: “当了晚上，当然深入冥想时，我总会听到他们的嚎叫。他们在卡尔哈拉狩猎，而我也渴望加入他们的行列。总有一天，我们会再见面的。”

languages.text: 「夜、瞑想に耽っていると、彼らの遠吠えが聞こえる。彼らはヴァルハラで狩りをしている。俺の心は彼らのところへ行きたいと切望する。いつかきっと再会できるだろう」
languages.original_text: "At night, when I sink into meditation, I hear them howling. They are hunting in Kjalhalla, and my heart yearns to join them. One day we will meet again."

traits.locale_text: 「夜、瞑想に耽っていると、彼らの遠吠えが聞こえる。彼らはヴァルハラで狩りをしている。俺の心は彼らのところへ行きたいと切望する。いつかきっと再会できるだろう」

languages.text: « La nuit, quand je plonge dans un état méditatif, je les entends encore hurler. Ils chassent à Kjalhalla et mon cœur brûle de les rejoindre. Un jour, nous serons de nouveau réunis. »
languages.original_text: "At night, when I sink into meditation, I hear them howling. They are hunting in Kjalhalla, and my heart yearns to join them. One day we will meet again."

traits.locale_text: « La nuit, quand je plonge dans un état méditatif, je les entends encore hurler. Ils chassent à Kjalhalla et mon cœur brûle de les rejoindre. Un jour, nous serons de nouveau réunis. »

languages.text: "Nachts, wenn ich in die Meditation verfalle, höre ich sie heulen. Sie jagen in Kjalhalla, und mein Herz sehnt sich danach, sich ihnen anzuschließen. Eines Tages werden wir sie wiedersehen."
languages.original_text: "At night, when I sink into meditation, I hear them howling. They are hunting in Kjalhalla, and my heart yearns to join them. One day we will meet again."

traits.locale_text: "Nachts, wenn ich in die Meditation verfalle, höre ich sie heulen. Sie jagen in Kjalhalla, und mein Herz sehnt sich danach, sich ihnen anzuschließen. Eines Tages werden wir sie wiedersehen."

languages.original_text: "At night, when I sink into meditation, I hear them howling. They are hunting in Kjalhalla, and my heart yearns to join them. One day we will meet again."

languages.text: "Geceleyin meditasyon yaparken uluduklarını duyuyorum. Kjalhalla'da avlanıyorlar. Yüreğim onlara katılmak için çırpınıyor. Bir gün yeniden buluşacağız."
languages.original_text: "At night, when I sink into meditation, I hear them howling. They are hunting in Kjalhalla, and my heart yearns to join them. One day we will meet again."

traits.locale_text: "Geceleyin meditasyon yaparken onların ulumasını duyuyorum. Kjalhalla'da avlanıyorlar ve yüreğim onlara katılmak için çırpınıyor. Bir gün yeniden buluşacağız."
